title: The Black Dwarf
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The west! the west!--thought Elliot; the country is pretty quiet downthat way, unless it were Jock o' the Todholes; and he's ower auld nowfor the like o' thae jobs.--West!--By My life, it must be Westburnflat. "Elshie, just tell me one word.

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
